select on_code,o.m_code,o.rs_code,on_type,on_open,on_muse_open,on_info,on_sale,on_content,on_casting,on_etc,on_viewstate, m_title, pr_name,pr_num,pr_pnum,pr_email from open_notice o, musical m, partner pr where o.rs_code=0 and o.on_code=#{on_code} and o.m_code = m.m_code and m.pr_code=pr.pr_code

select on_code,o.m_code,o.rs_code,on_type,on_open,on_muse_open,on_info,on_sale,on_content,on_casting,on_etc,on_viewstate, m_title, pr_name,pr_num,pr_pnum,pr_email from open_notice o, musical m, partner pr where o.rs_code=1 and o.on_code=#{on_code} and o.m_code = m.m_code and m.pr_code=pr.pr_code

mapper.select: select b.b_code, b.m_code, b.b_date, m.m_title, m.m_poster, pr.pr_name from banner b, musical m, partner pr where b.m_code = m.m_code and m.pr_code = pr.pr_code order by b.b_date
SELECT m.m_code, m.m_title, m.m_poster, pr.pr_name FROM musical m JOIN partner pr ON m.pr_code = pr.pr_code LEFT JOIN banner b ON m.m_code = b.m_code WHERE m.m_viewstate = 1 AND b.m_code IS NULL
select u.u_id,u_name,u_pnum,u_email, pr_code,pr_name,pr_num,pr_pnum,pr_email,rs_code from partner p, users u where rs_code=0 and p.u_id = u.u_id

mapper.select: select mr_code, mr_score, mr_title,mr_content, mr_date, m_title,u_id,mr_state from musical_review mr, booking b, musical_option mo, musical m where b.b_code = mr.b_code and b.mo_code = mo.mo_code and m.m_code = mo.m_code order by mr_date desc
